parameters: By the way, you ARE old enough to drink, right?
That makes things so much less weird.
This is the inn...Wait... No it's not.
We're going in. Don't be. Stupid.
Well, this is Old Gravelton. It's not much, but
it's got enough to keep us settled for now.
Woah...You know, this is the first town I've
ever been to that wasn't my own.
I guess this ain't a bad first impression.
You've been to a ton of towns and stuff, right?

Well, my legs are tired. As good a time as any

...day for a barrel to be outside.
I was thinking just the same thing, actually.
What a beautiful day to have a barrel outside.
Fine. I'll let you guys pass.
(Hey, you two! Keep it down! I don't want them coming over

Well, I could give you some booze-
Well, how about some chicken? That bandit over there ordered

Hah, these guys don't know a thing about
Thank you guys, that was GOOD.
Oh, it's fine. You guys did save us from getting our money

Oh, so THAT'S why it was so soggy!
Just go and help out the other townsfolk. I bet they're in
